primary.title: Kommandr
primary.text: Hundreds of simple commands, right at your fingertips.

secondary.title: At your service
secondary.text: Just start typing. Kommandr will start making suggestions. From screenshots, to notes, to bookmarks. Do at all with a few taps of the keyboard.

secondary.title: Here Comes Everybody
secondary.text: Integrate with all your favorite apps. Want a send a message with Facebook, or save a page to Evernote? We've got you covered?

secondary.title: Keep Connected
secondary.text: Kommandr makes it easy to send sites and files to all your devices so they're there when you need them.
